#include <iostream>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int gcd(int a, int b) {
    int t;
    while(b) {
        t = b;
        b = a%b;
        a = t;
    }
    return a;
}

int main() {
    int t, n, c;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--) {
        cin >> n;
        c = 0;
        for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i)
            c+=(gcd(n,i)==1)?1:0;
        cout << c << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
